description: Robust, warm hunting trousers for hunting in winter and cold conditions now with an updated fit. Made of soft and rustle-free G-1000 Silent with Hydratic that keeps moisture out and a warm lining of high-loft mesh from the waist to just below the knees. The knees are reinforced with double layers of fabric for extra durability and have openings for kneepads (an accessory). Mid waist with double belt loops that is cut higher at the back to ensure that the trousers sit well even when crouching down. Reinforced attachment zones for braces and zippered back pocket. Knife pocket on right leg and two generous leg pockets now with zippers under the pocket flaps and mesh media pockets. Velcro adjustments at leg endings.
name: Fjallraven Brenner Pro Winter Trousers, Reg - Mens
